meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7759.

td.p: Katherine Saxby, a high school English and French teacher from Alameda, California
Indi Ekanayake, an 8th grade science teacher from Seattle, Washington
Beth Binder, a 6th grade teacher from Fort Collins, Colorado

tr.td: HOBBIES & PASTIMES
GREAT AMERICAN NOVELS
SHALL WE "DANCE"?
TITLES MADE METRIC
ALL EYES
ON YOU
